content: Led an evaluation of performance to assess measurable impact after launching scorecard product
Collaborated with operations team and data scientists to identify key metrics and review data gaps, thank you to all!
Created a scorecard lifecycle graphic to illustrate the product's cyclic nature and guide the impact narrative
Created an overview page with main takeaways to precede detailed metric analysis
Structured metric display with clear definitions, and moving from left to right, starts with most generic to more specific
Developed user-friendly metric presentation by standardizing improvement direction (showing 'significant improvement' and 'percent improvement')
